meanings.definition: In a diligent and hard-working manner.
meanings.sent1: She worked industriously on her homework, making sure to double-check every answer.
meanings.sent2: The ants industriously gathered food for the winter season.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel industriously collected acorns, preparing for a feast.
meanings.sent4: The bees buzzed industriously, pollinating the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The student industriously studied for the upcoming exam, determined to succeed.

meanings.sent1: He climbed the mountain industriously, taking one step at a time.
meanings.sent2: The chef industriously prepared the elaborate meal for the special guests.
meanings.sent3: The toddler industriously tried to reach the cookie jar on the high shelf.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted industriously through the night, finishing the masterpiece at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The athlete trained industriously every day, aiming to break the world record.
